docstring.short_description: Connect to a slcan-compatible USB-to-CAN adapter.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The serial device to connect to.

parameters.name: CAN_address
parameters.description:
The `CAN_address` to use in other blocks to refer to this connection.
Note: This is not the physical address of the device, but rather a unique identifier for the connection. Needed since not all CAN bus connection can be retreive with a SerialDevice.

parameters.name: bitrate
parameters.description: The bitrate to use for the CAN bus.
